Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Cygnar::
       "Ah, yes Cryotek.  I remember hearing of your exploits.  Although you 
may wish to make yourself comfortable.  It may take some time to rally enough 
troops to properly attack Hydras and the Predacons.  However, I believe 
allies can be gathered to our cause.  Now, I must excuse myself I have some 
calls to make."  He rises from his chair and proceeds into Galvatron's old 
office, properly secured from outside listening devices he sends out two 
messages.  The first he sends to Rodimus Prime and the second he sends to 
Tyrael.

The message to Rodimus Prime:
       "Hello again Rodimus Prime.  I suspect you were not expecting to hear 
from me so soon.  But the battle that I warned you about has had some ... 
shall we say unexpected results.  Galvatron has merged with Megatron to 
become Hydras and taken most of his force with him.  I am currently in 
command of the remnants of his troops.  I know you want him dead and I want 
him back alive but that is a minor detail.  I wish to plan an assault on the 
Predacon base and I need allies to succeed.  Cygnar out."

The message to the Tripredacus:
       "This is Cygnar leader of the remnants of Galvatron's forces.  I am 
planning an assault on the Predacon base and I need allies to succeed.  
Cygnar out."

--part1_f8.22d19301.2ad1012e_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>::Cygnar::
<BR>       "Ah, yes Cryotek.  I remember hearing of your exploits.  Although you may wish to make yourself comfortable.  It may take some time to rally enough troops to properly attack Hydras and the Predacons.  However, I believe allies can be gathered to our cause.  Now, I must excuse myself I have some calls to make."  He rises from his chair and proceeds into Galvatron's old office, properly secured from outside listening devices he sends out two messages.  The first he sends to Rodimus Prime and the second he sends to Tyrael.
<BR>
<BR>The message to Rodimus Prime:
<BR>       "Hello again Rodimus Prime.  I suspect you were not expecting to hear from me so soon.  But the battle that I warned you about has had some ... shall we say unexpected results.  Galvatron has merged with Megatron to become Hydras and taken most of his force with him.  I am currently in command of the remnants of his troops.  I know you want him dead and I want him back alive but that is a minor detail.  I wish to plan an assault on the Predacon base and I need allies to succeed.  Cygnar out."
<BR>
<BR>The message to the Tripredacus:
<BR>       "This is Cygnar leader of the remnants of Galvatron's forces.  I am planning an assault on the Predacon base and I need allies to succeed.  Cygnar out."</FONT></HTML>
